title: These chic places to charge your electric car make eco-friendly luxury roadtrips a possibility
text:
Electric vehicle charging points are no longer confined to the far corner of a car park at a motorway service station. Scores of rapid top-up points are now appearing at some of the chicest locations around the country.

Whether it’s a night at the opera at Glyndebourne, an organic shopping trip to Daylesford in Oxfordshire, or a stay at the Mandarin Oriental hotel opposite Hyde Park, luxury business owners are finally embracing the electric vehicle (EV) revolution.

According to figures released this summer, there are now almost 1,000 more public places to charge EVs than fuel filling station in the UK: 9,300 charging locations compared to 8,400 fuel stations.
